confOf#Trip: The trip is a child of a social event.
confOf#Banquet: The banquet is child of socialvent who is the parent of the trip.
confOf#Reception: Socialevent is a child of reception and is parented by administrativeevent and reviewingresultsevent.
confOf#Social_event: Socialvent is the parent of reception and banquet. It is also the parent of workingevent and workshop.
confOf#Event: The social event is the parent of the banquet and the working event. The working event is also the parent of the tutorial and the reviewingresults event.
confOf#Contribution: The short paper and the poster are both contributions.
confOf#Organization: The parent company of the organization is the university.
confOf#Person: The parent of a volunteer is the parent of a regular and a scienceworker. The other parents are the assistant and the volunteer.
confOf#Company: The company is child of the organization which is parented by the university.
confOf#University: The university is the child of the organization which is parented by the company.
confOf#Scholar: The child of a scholar is a child of a Thing.
confOf#Administrator: The administrator is the child of the person who is the parent of the scholar.
confOf#Poster: The poster is a child of a Thing.
confOf#Paper: The paper is the child of the contribution which is the parent of the poster.
confOf#Short_paper: The short paper is a child of the contribution which is the parent of the paper.
confOf#Reviewing_results_event: reviewingresultsevent is a child of administrativeevent which is the parent of reviewingevent.
confOf#Administrative_event: The administrativeevent is the parent of the social event, the banquet and the registration of participants. It also is the parent of the review and the submission events.
confOf#Reviewing_event: reviewingevent is a child of administrativeevent and is parented by camerareadyevent.
confOf#Registration_of_participants_even: The registrationofparticipantsevent is a child of the administrativeevent which is parented by the reviewingevent.
confOf#Submission_event: The submissionevent is a child of the administrativeevent which is the parent of the reviewingresultsevent.
confOf#Camera_Ready_event: Camerareadyevent is a child of administrativeevent which is parented by registrationofparticipantsevent.
confOf#Workshop: The workingevent is the child of the workshop and the parent of the tutorial.
confOf#Conference: The workingevent is the parent of the conference and the workshop.
confOf#Tutorial: The workingevent is the parent of the conference and is the child of the tutorial.
confOf#Working_event: The workingevent is the parent of the reception, the workshop, the conference and the tutorial. The social event is also the parent of the conference.
confOf#Member: The child of the participant is the parent of the regular participant.
confOf#Participant: The parent of a participant is a student and the child of a regular. The child is also a child of a Thing and a member of the family.
confOf#Member_PC: The child of the chair is the child of the member.
confOf#Chair_PC: The chair is child of the person who is the parent of the participant and the student.
confOf#Student: The student is the child of the participant and the parent of the participant.
confOf#Science_Worker: The child of a science worker is the parent of a scholar.
confOf#Assistant: The assistant is a child of a person who is also a child of a Thing.
confOf#Volunteer: The child of a volunteer is a child of a Thing.
confOf#Regular: The child of the participant is the child of the parent of the author. The child is a regular.
confOf#Author: The author is the child of a person who is a science worker.
